{"id":613826612,"lang":"cpp","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1641421308,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/613826612/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"15.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& heights) {\n    \n        int left = 0 ;\n        int right = heights.size()-1;\n        int leftmax =0 ;\n        int rightmax =0 ;\n        int res = 0;\n        while(left <right){\n            leftmax = max(leftmax,heights[left]);\n            rightmax = max(rightmax ,heights[right]);\n            if(leftmax < rightmax){\n                res += leftmax - heights[left];\n                left++;\n            }\n            else{\n                res += rightmax - heights[right];\n                right--;\n            }\n        }\n        return res ;\n        \n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
